User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Block private/admin areas
Disallow: /admin-dashboard
Disallow: /enhanced-admin-dashboard
Disallow: /saved-jobs
Disallow: /resume-manager
Disallow: /auth
Disallow: /reset-password
Disallow: /forgot-password

# Allow public pages
Allow: /find-work
Allow: /post-job
Allow: /ownership
Allow: /about
Allow: /contact
Allow: /privacy-policy
Allow: /terms-and-conditions
Allow: /anti-theft

Sitemap: https://www.medstaffpremier.ca/sitemap.xml
